content: As an AI language model, I suggest you explore the government's official websites and other relevant online resources such as the Nigerian Investment Promotion Commission (NIPC) website or the Africa Investment Forum. The Nigerian Bureau of Statistics may also provide valuable data and insights on the state of the economy and ongoing initiatives. Furthermore, you can also consult with industry associations, business groups, and local chambers of commerce in Ibadan to obtain up-to-date information on the latest developments and initiatives.
